title: Oh look, new champion.
body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/02/bard-wandering-caretaker-revealed.html

But why is he unique rito?

**"Unrivalled team mobility with his long range portals."**

Wow, no one saw that coming.

replies.body:
It's funny because Riot said the next Champ wont have any mobility and CC

HA aha HAHAHAHAH

a support champ with no CC is useless.

They only said no Knock Up

> [{quoted}](name=xJLx MCHammer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lGp7EalZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-24T19:34:17.184+0000)
>
> It's funny because Riot said the next Champ wont have any mobility and CC
> 
> HA aha HAHAHAHAH

They said they won't have any knockups

They didn't say anything about no mobility or CC
